title: Shirk's Meats Recalls Pork and Beef Products Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, June 20, 2015 Shirks Meat, a Dundee, N.Y. establishment, is recalling approximately 2,478 pounds of pork and beef products that may be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.The various pork and beef items...
